about_the_game:
The Kaiju Chaos Bundle includes:

  • Labor Ranger (exclusive playable character)



  • with five outfits!



  • Green Bean (exclusive playable character)



    with five outfits!





    Comrade!
    Authorized by the Soviet Jump Game Ministry of Information for the first time ever, we are pleased to announce the “Kaiju Chaos Bundle”!

    Initially only available to inner-circle party members , we are releasing this to the general public in a safe and government-sanctioned setting to help broaden the public's understanding of Japan's art and culture.

    While they are not part of our great Soviet Republic, the Ministry of Information has deemed the successes and failures of this eastern nation of great importance to the future survival of our own body politic.


    Did you know?
    -Japan is an island nation to the east.
    -Japan is beset by regular attacks by large monsters that cause untold destruction on a regular basis to major cities throughout the country.
    -To combat this blight, Japan has created an elite unit of strong mechanical “Rangers" to meet and defeat the Kaiju on the battlefield.
    -In an ever-increasing arms race, the Rangers and Kaiju continue to grow both in size and ferocity, to the point in which both factions can easily tower over the tallest skyscrapers.
    -"Anime" is not to be trusted
detailed_description:
The Kaiju Chaos Bundle includes:

  • Labor Ranger (exclusive playable character)



  • with five outfits!



  • Green Bean (exclusive playable character)



    with five outfits!





    Comrade!
    Authorized by the Soviet Jump Game Ministry of Information for the first time ever, we are pleased to announce the “Kaiju Chaos Bundle”!

    Initially only available to inner-circle party members , we are releasing this to the general public in a safe and government-sanctioned setting to help broaden the public's understanding of Japan's art and culture.

    While they are not part of our great Soviet Republic, the Ministry of Information has deemed the successes and failures of this eastern nation of great importance to the future survival of our own body politic.


    Did you know?
    -Japan is an island nation to the east.
    -Japan is beset by regular attacks by large monsters that cause untold destruction on a regular basis to major cities throughout the country.
    -To combat this blight, Japan has created an elite unit of strong mechanical “Rangers" to meet and defeat the Kaiju on the battlefield.
    -In an ever-increasing arms race, the Rangers and Kaiju continue to grow both in size and ferocity, to the point in which both factions can easily tower over the tallest skyscrapers.
    -"Anime" is not to be trusted
